precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over an empty area of the desktop.
A right-click context menu titled 'Arrange Icons By' is visible on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will open, and the 'Themes' tab will be active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu, "Wait" time setting, and "Settings" button will become visible.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu displays "Windows XP".
action: Click the down arrow on the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available screen savers.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Wait" time field is currently selected.
action: Click on any empty space within the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.  The 'Power...' button is visible within the 'Monitor power' section.
action: Click the 'Power...' button in the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open, displaying the 'Power Schemes' tab and various power management settings.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Power schemes" dropdown menu, then click "Always On".
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will display "Always On" as the selected power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Presentation".
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will display "Presentation" as the selected power scheme. The "Turn off monitor" setting will change to "After 20 mins".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button labeled "After 20 mins" next to the "Turn off monitor" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time options for the monitor to turn off automatically.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open with the 'Power Schemes' tab selected. The 'Always On' power scheme is selected and the 'System hibernates' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'System hibernates' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu will close. The system will now be configured to never enter hibernation automatically.

precondition:
The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Always On" power scheme should be selected, and the following settings should be set to "Never":
- Turn off monitor
- Turn off hard disks
- System standby
- System hibernates
expected_results: The changes made to the "Always On" power scheme will be applied.
The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
